name: stylelint-config-itgalaxy-style
description: A mostly reasonable approach to CSS and SCSS.

scripts.preinstall: npm run install:config && npm run install:config:scss
scripts.install:config: cd packages/stylelint-config-itgalaxy && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config:scss: cd packages/stylelint-config-itgalaxy-scss && npm prune && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:config && npm run test:config:scss
scripts.travis: npm run travis:config && npm run travis:config:scss

author: Itgalaxy
alert: please not install below dependencies and devDependencies, this need only for https://david-dm.org/
